GSP33rams11au:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GSP33rams11au:8: tad ayuktam; tad dhi na vākya-pratipādyam /
GSP33rams11au:11: śastraṃ yasya yoniḥ --- kāraṇaṃ, pramāṇam, tac chāstra-yoniḥ; tasya bhāvaś śāstra-yonitvam; tasmāt /
GSP33rams11au:14: śāstrai1ka-pramāṇakatvād ukta-svarūpaṃ brahma yato vā imāni
GSP33rams11au:16: nanu śāstra-yonitvaṃ brahmaṇo na saṃbhavati, pramāṇā1ntara-vedyatvād
GSP33rams11au:27: pūrvā1nubhūta-viṣaya-smṛti-mātratvān na prāmāṇyam iti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?
GSP33rams11au:28: tad-atirikta-viṣayatve kāraṇā1bhāvāt; tathā sati tasya bhrama-rūpavatā /
GSP33rams11au:40: kim idam eka-cetanā1dhīnatvam ? na tāvat tad-āyatto1tpatti-sthititvam; dṛṣṭānto hi sādhya-vikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33rams11au:41: na hy arogaṃ sva-śarīram eka-cetanā3yatto1tpatti-sthiti; tac-charīrasya
GSP33rams11au:45: prāṇana-lakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣatvā1bhimate kṣiti-jaladhi-mahīdharā3dau na saṃbhavatī7ti
GSP33rams11au:51: kiṃ ca, ubhaya-vādi-siddhānāṃ jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛtvā1bhyupagamo
GSP33rams11au:57: bhaktimat-sākṣātkāra eva hi kāryā3rambho1payogī; śaktes tu jñāna-mātram evo7payujyate, na sākṣātkāraḥ /
GSP33rams11au:59: kāryo1pakaraṇa-bhūta-daṇḍa-cakrā3divat tac-chaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭa-maṇikā3di-kāryam ārabhante /
GSP33rams11au:61: kiṃ ca, yac-chakya-kriyaṃ śakyo1pādānā3di-vijñānaṃ ca tad eva
GSP33rams11au:68: parigrahavatā9nāpta-kāmena nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathā-vidham eva cetanaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayann ayaṃ kāryatva-hetus
GSP33rams11au:77: ata āgamād ṛte katham īśvaras setsyati ?
GSP33rams11au:78: sā1vayavatvād eva jagataḥ kāryatvaṃ na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33rams11au:79: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ --- vivādā1dhyāsitaṃ bhū-bhūdharā3di kāryam,
GSP33rams11au:81: avani-jaladhi-mahīdharā3di kāryam, mahattve sati kriyāvattvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33rams11au:82: tanu-bhuvanā3di kāryam, mahattve sati mūrtatvāt, ghaṭavat --- iti /
GSP33rams11au:83: sā1vayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate ne7tarad iti kāryatvasya niyāmakaṃ
GSP33rams11au:85: śakya-kriyatvaṃ śakyo1pādānā3di-vijñānatvaṃ co7palabhyata iti cen na;
GSP33rams11au:86: kāryatvenā7numate 'pi viṣaye jñāna-śaktī kāryā1numeye ity anyatrā7pi
GSP33rams11au:87: sā1vayavatvā3dinā kāryatvaṃ jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eve7ti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33rams11au:91: avayava-sanniveṣa-viśeṣeṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ niścitya tadānīm eva kartus
GSP33rams11au:93: atas tanu-bhuvanā3deḥ kāryatve siddhe sarva-sākṣātkāra-tan-nirmāṇā3di-nipuṇaḥ kvacit puruṣa-viśeṣas
GSP33rams11au:101: tata eva sukhā3dibhir vyabhicāra-vacanam api tathai9va /
GSP33rams11au:115: / kenacit kiṃcit kriyamāṇaṃ svo1tpattaye kartus sva-nirmāṇa-sāmarthyaṃ
GSP33rams11au:116: svo1pādāno1pakaraṇa-jñānaṃ cā7pekṣate; na tv anyā1sāmarthyam anya-jñānaṃ
GSP33rams11au:120: na tāvat sarva-viṣayam; na hi kulālā3diḥ kriyamāṇa-vyatiriktaṃ kim api na jānāti /
GSP33rams11au:121: nā7pi katipaya-viṣayam; sarveṣu kartṛṣu tat-tad-ajñānā1śakty-aniyamena sarveṣām ajñānā3dīnāṃ vyabhicārāt /
GSP33rams11au:123: kāryatvasyā7sādhakānām anīśvaratvā3dīnāṃ liṅginy apratītir iti na
GSP33rams11au:125: kulālā3dīnāṃ daṇḍa-cakrā3dy-adhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīra-dvāreṇai7va dṛṣṭam iti jagad-upādāno1pakaraṇā1dhiṣṭhānam īśvarasyā7-śarīrasyā7nupapannam iti cen na; saṃkalpa-mātreṇai7va
GSP33rams11au:127: a-śarīrasya para-pravartana-rūpas saṃkalpa iti cet; na śarīrā1pekṣas
GSP33rams11au:133: sa-manaskatvād iti cen na; manaso nityatvena dehā1pagame 'pi manasas
GSP33rams11au:143: kāryatvā1nupapattyā ca nai7kam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagato nimittam upādānaṃ ca pratipādayituṃ evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ --- yatho9kta-lakṣaṇaṃ brahma janmā3di-vākyaṃ bodhayaty eva /
GSP33rams11au:145: yad uktaṃ sā1vayavatvā3dinā kāryaṃ sarvaṃ jagat, kāryaṃ ca tad-ucita-kartṛ-viśeṣa-pūrvakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti nikhila-jagan-nirmāṇa-tad-upādāno1pakaraṇa-vedana-caturaḥ kaścid anumeya iti; tad ayuktam; mahī-mahārṇavā3dīnāṃ kāryatve 'pi ekadai9vai7kenai7va
GSP33rams11au:147: na cai7kasya ghaṭasye7va sarveṣām ekaṃ kāryatvam, yenai7kadai9kaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33rams11au:151: tad-atirikta-kalpanāyām aneka-kalpanā2nupapatteś ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum
GSP33rams11au:156: sarvo1tpattis sarvo1cchittiś ca pramāṇa-padavīm adhirohataḥ; adarśanāt,
GSP33rams11au:165: sārvajñya-sarva-śakti-yuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idaṃ kāryatvaṃ kiṃ yugamad-utpadyamāna-sarva-vastu-gatam ? uta
GSP33rams11au:170: śāstra-virodhaś ca; kumbha-kāro jāyate, ratha-kāro jāyata ity-ādi-śravaṇāt
GSP33rams11au:171: / api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ śarīrā3dīnāṃ ca
GSP33rams11au:181: ataḥ kṣetra-jñā eva kartāraḥ, na tad-vilakṣaṇaḥ kaścid anumānāt sidhyati /
GSP33rams11au:189: vyabhicāraḥ, tatrā7py anādes sūkṣma-śarīrasta sad-bhāvāt/ vimati-viṣayaḥ
GSP33rams11au:190: kālo na loka-śūnyaḥ, kālatvāt, vartamāna-kālavad iti /
GSP33rams11au:191: api ca, kim īśvaras sa-śarīro 'śarīro vā kāryaṃ karoti ? na tāvad a-śarīraḥ; a-śarīrasya mānasāny api kāryāṇi
GSP33rams11au:192: sa-śarīrasyai7va bhavanti; manaso nityatve 'pi a-śarīreṣu mukteṣu
GSP33rams11au:194: kiṃ nityam utā7nityam ? na tāvan nityam; sā1vayavasya tasya nityatve jagato 'pi nityatvā1virodhād nā7py anityam;
GSP33rams11au:196: svayam eva hetur iti cen na; a-śarīrasya tad-ayogāt; anyena śarīreṇa sa-śarīra iti cen na;
GSP33rams11au:198: sa kiṃ sa-vyāpāro nirvyāpāro vā ? a-śarīratvād eva na sa-vyāpāraḥ /
GSP33rams11au:200: kāryaṃ jagad icchā-mātra-vyāpāra-kartṛkam ity ucyamāne pakṣasyā7prasiddha-viśeṣaṇatvam,
GSP33rams11au:206: yat tu nimitto1pādānayor aikyam ākāśā3der niravayava-dravyasya kāryatvaṃ
GSP33rams11au:207: cā7nupalabdham aśakya-pratipādanam ity uktam, tad apy aviruddham iti prakṛtiś ca pratijñā-dṛṣṭāntā1nuparodhāt, na viyad-aśruter ity atra pratipādayiṣyate /
GSP33rams11au:209: yato vā imāni bhūtānī7ti vākyam ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipādayatī7ti
